outline:
1. to be or become rich or wealthy, enrich, pretend to be rich
    1. (Qal) to be or become rich
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to make rich
      2. to gain riches
    3. (Hithpael) to enrich oneself, pretend to be rich
kjv_def: be(-come, en-, make, make self, wax) rich, make (1 Kings 22:48 marg). See H6240 (עָשָׂר).
strongs_def: properly, to accumulate; chiefly (specifically) to grow (causatively, make) rich
